summary: The history of post-World War II popular dance up to the mid-sixties is explored with the focus being on the Twist.
cast: Cholly Atkins|Frankie Avalon|Hank Ballard|Gary U.S. Bonds|Chubby Checker|Joey Dee|Fats Domino|Joe Fusco|Buddy Holly|Gladys Horton|Susan Horton|Little Richard|Mama Lu Parks|Elvis Presley|Dee Dee Sharp
title: Twist
